description: Sadie Stein, Deputy Editor of The Paris Review, is excited about a new video game that will either appeal to authors struggling with writer’s block  – or possibly make them very, very sad.

teaser: Sadie Stein, Deputy Editor of The Paris Review, is excited about a new video game that will either appeal to authors struggling with writer’s block  – or possibly make them very, very sad.
title: ‘The Novelist’: Video Game or Existential Nightmare?
